attributes.action: Forcibly sack Phil Brown from Southend United
attributes.additional_details: This can not go on any longer, Phil you’re destroying our club. He sacked our best player Nile Ranger and he keeps going with the poorest tactical team week in and out. Please save our club. It takes 2 minutes to sign! #BrownOut
attributes.background: We (Southend United fans) are sick of watching the shambles of what Phil Brown calls football. His decisions are wrong and we need a change before it’s too late. Not to mention the irons in the fire!
